cleaned_text: Assignment What is CAM and how is it different from traditional (orthodox) medicine? This assignment helps you apply your knowledge from this week's modules and readings. It is important for you to learn about CAM practices to gain a holistic understanding of the healthcare field. Allied healthcare workers may accept positions in chiropractic offices or perform billing and coding paperwork associated with a CAM practice and so forth.
